editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven, Refrigerator, Trash compactor
editedFacts.rooms: Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Master bath, Mud room, Pantry, Recreation room, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription: R.V. Parking, Cul-de-sac lot, East facing backyard on nearly half an acre with 12x10 storage shed! What else could you want? What a fantastic home in great Boise location and short distance to Spalding Elementary School. Large finished basement with HUGE storage room, 2 beds and full bath. Fairly updated home with a brand new furnace, carpet 3 years old, exterior paint 4 years old, Tile floors in all baths, hardwood floors, double oven, etc.
